articles.title: Kim Jong Un Guides "Dropping and Target-striking Contest of KPA Special Operation Units - 2017"
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Guides "Dropping and Target-striking Contest of KPA Special Operation Forces - 2017"
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA) Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and chairman of the DPRK State Affairs Commission, guided the "Dropping and Target-striking Contest of KPA Special Operation Forces - 2017".
					 Taking part in the contest were combatants of the special operation battalion under the direct control of KPA Unit 525, the 4th taskforce of the 5th detached force of Unit 2625 of KPA Large Combined Unit 630, the 2nd taskforce of the 1st detached force of Unit 252 of the KPA Navy and the 1st taskforce of the 1st detached force of Unit 323 of the KPA Air and Anti-Aircraft Force and light transport and helicopter gunship regiments of the Air and Anti-Aircraft Force.
					
					 The Supreme Commander heard a report on the program of the contest and issued an order to start it at the observation post.
					
					 Light transport planes made zero feet flight in the sky above the drill ground and combatants dropped from them.
					
					 The Supreme Commander said with a broad smile on his face that the combatants were very good at dropping from the planes making zero feet flight. He was pleased that the commanding officers of those taskforces and pilots of the transport planes properly fixed the dropping place, the flight altitude and the dropping moment in a coordinated operation and that they seemed to have made a deep study of the reconnaissance data about the enemy targets.
					
					 Watching the brave combatants mercilessly blow up the enemy targets, he said with pleasure that the commanding officers made correct decisions, adding those combatants carrying out their duties independently and pro-actively were reminiscent of fierce tigers crossing the mountain ranges in the southern half.
					
					 After watching an automatic rifle live bullet firing of combatants of the special operation battalion under the direct control of KPA Unit 525, he said that the bullets seemed to have their eyes and they were crack shots never missing targets.
					
					 He said that the contest, successfully conducted in the significant time marking the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, is like the gift of loyalty presented by the powerful revolutionary Paektusan army to the President who had worked heart and soul to round off the KPA's combat preparations, urging its service personnel to intensify trainings with national reunification in their minds at all times.
					
					 He gave the special operation battalion under the direct control of KPA Unit 525, which won in the contest, a pair of binoculars and an automatic rifle as a gift before having a photo session with the participants in the contest.

articles.title: Inaugural Ceremony of Ryomyong Street Held in Presence of Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Inaugural Ceremony of Ryomyong Street Held in Presence of Kim Jong Un
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Magnificent Ryomyong Street has made its appearance in the area of the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun, the sacred temple of Juche, amid the mounting festive atmosphere for celebrating the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung as the greatest auspicious holiday of the nation.
					 The street, which was built as an icon of modern street architecture and a fairyland representing the era of the Workers' Party, is a gift of loyalty presented by the army and people of the DPRK to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Its inaugural ceremony took place with splendor on Thursday in the presence of Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Present there were senior party, state and army officials including Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju and Choe Ryong Hae and officials of party and armed forces organs, ministries and national institutions, delegates to the celebrations of the 105th birth anniversary of the President, army and social officials, soldier-builders and shock brigade members who took part in the construction, officials of institutions and industrial establishments in Pyongyang, scientists, educators, youths and students and other Pyongyangites.
					
					 Also on hand were overseas Koreans' congratulatory groups and delegations, overseas compatriots, the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front, representatives of foreign embassies and international bodies and military attaches and their spouses and foreign guests.
					
					 Pak Pong Ju made an inaugural speech.
					
					 The speaker said the ceremony for the successful completion of Ryomyong Street represents a report on the shining victory won by the army and people to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and a great event of adding luster to the Day of the Sun, the greatest auspicious holiday of the Korean nation. He went on:
					
					 Ryomyong Street is like an ever-lasting monument to the love for the people as it reflects the intention of the motherly Party to let the people enjoy the highest level of civilization.
					
					 Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un proclaimed the construction of the street and energetically led its whole course.
					
					 Ryomyong Street symbolic of the great era of Kim Jong Un is a proud edifice in the era of Mallima that sprang up thanks to the indomitable mental power of the army and people of the DPRK and their inexhaustible might of self-reliance and self-development to flatten even a mountain and empty a sea if it is a call of the Party.
					
					 Kim Jong Un cut the inaugural tape.
					
					 He waved back to the enthusiastically cheering crowd.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony all the participants went round the street together with senior party, state and army officials.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Educational Aid Fund and Stipends to Korean Children in Japan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Educational Aid Fund and Stipends to Korean Children in Japan
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un sent educational aid fund and stipends amounting to 218 million yen in Japanese currency to the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan for the democratic national education of children of Koreans in Japan on the occasion of the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The educational aid fund and stipends sent by the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un in 163 installments so far total to 48,005,990,390 yen.

articles.title: KCNA Detailed Report on Completion of Ryomyong Street
articles.content:
KCNA Detailed Report on Completion of Ryomyong Street
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- The Korean Central News Agency Thursday released a detailed report on the heroic struggle waged by the army and people of the DPRK to build Ryomyong Street at the highest level on the occasion of the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Ryomyong Street has been splendidly completed amid the festive atmosphere that mounts across the country for celebrating the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, the report says, and goes on:
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK built the gorgeous socialist fairyland street as big as a city in one year while conducting the intensive drive for recovering from flood damage in North Hamgyong Province, thereby clearly showing the world the high-speed advance of socialist construction, the speed of building a powerful country of our Party.
					
					 Sky-scrapers, including the 70-storeyed apartment house and high-rise and multi-storeyed apartment houses built as perfect green buildings based on a formative art to comply with the Party's unique Juche-based idea on architectural beauty and as required by the new century, form perfect harmony with modern service facilities in the street. This is a grand monument in the era of the Workers' Party representing the highest civilization, symbolic of the great leaps forward being made by great Kim Jong Un's Korea dashing toward the dawn of the final victory.
					
					 Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un unfolded the bright blueprint for building Ryomyong Street and provided wise guidance for its construction.
					
					 The detailed report tells about the feats the service personnel, builders and shock brigade members performed by waging a heroic struggle during the period of construction.
					
					 It stresses that Ryomyong Street, which magnificently sprang up in Pyongyang under the grandiose plan of Kim Jong Un and his wise guidance, will shine as a fairyland in the era of the Workers' Party, demonstrating the might of Juche Korea dashing toward the bright dawn of a socialist power.

articles.title: Merits of Builders of Ryomyong Street and Their Helpers Highly Appreciated
articles.content:
Merits of Builders of Ryomyong Street and Their Helpers Highly Appreciated
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, the Central Military Commission of the WPK and the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK sent a letter of thanks Thursday to the service personnel and shock brigade members and their helpers who demonstrated the mightiness and invincible spirit of socialist Korea by successfully building Ryomyong Street as a great edifice representing the era of Mallima.
					 The letter noted that the completion of the street is a gift of loyalty presented by the descendents of President Kim Il Sung, soldiers and disciples of leader Kim Jong Il to the President and Kim Jong Il, a great victory achieved by the Party and the state, the service personnel and people and a great and auspicious all-people event.
					
					 It said that the Central Committee of the WPK, the Central Military Commission of the WPK and the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK extended the warmest thanks and militant greetings to the service personnel of the Korean People's Army, shock brigade members and their helpers from across the country for building Ryomyong Street in a short span of 9 months.
					
					 The fighting spirit displayed by the participants in the construction and their helpers to devotedly implement the intention of the Party and the exploits performed by them will be recorded as a shining page in the history of the glorious Juche revolution along with prospering Pyongyang, it noted.
					
					 The letter underlined the need for the Party and the state, the service personnel and people to attain earlier the strategic goals for building a socialist power as planned at the 7th Congress of the WPK true to the great leaders' patriotic cause for building a power.
					
					 It expressed belief that the service personnel and shock brigade members involved in the construction and their helpers would proactively contribute to hastening the final victory of the Juche revolution by ceaselessly making great leaps forward and innovations at their posts for safeguarding the country and at their worksites for building a socialist power.

articles.title: U.S. Military Attack on Sovereign State Blasted
articles.content:
U.S. Military Attack on Sovereign State Blasted
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- A spokesman of the Institute for Disarmament and Peace (IDP) of the DPRK Foreign Ministry issued a statement on April 13 to condemn the U.S. for making military attacks at a sovereign state while crying out for "peace by strength."
					 As already reported, the U.S. massive missile attack on Syria constitutes a blatant violation of international law and an insolent and barbarous act of aggression.
					
					 The statement said that the U.S. is disturbing the global peace and stability and insisting on the gangster-like logic that its invasion of a sovereign state is "decisive, just and proportionate" and contributes to "defending" the international order in its bid to apply it to the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. introduces into the Korean peninsula, the world's biggest hotspot, huge nuclear strategic assets, seriously threatening peace and security of the peninsula and pushing the situation there to the brink of a war, it pointed out, saying:
					
					 This has created a dangerous situation in which a thermo-nuclear war may break out any moment on the peninsula and posed serious threat to the world peace and security, to say nothing of those in Northeast Asia.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that the U.S. openly connives at the south Korean puppet forces who are openly blustering that they can test-fire a ballistic missile of 800km range and deploy it for an actual battle as a strategic asset for "removing the headquarters in the north".
					
					 The U.S. connives at whatever is launched by its allies, whether it is a missile or a spy satellite but it slings mud at those launched by independent countries, claiming it can fire missiles at those countries. This biased act little short of the application of double-standards can never be tolerated.
					
					 The reality reinforces the truth of history that peace is not offered by others but has to be defended by one's own strength, and clearly proves what a correct option the DPRK made when it decided to drastically bolster the nuclear force while tightening belt.
					
					 Nothing will be more childish and foolish than for the U.S. to dream of "bringing down social system" in the DPRK through "cooperation" with someone.

articles.title: CPRC Memorandum on Kim Il Sung's Feats for Country's Reunification
articles.content:
CPRC Memorandum on Kim Il Sung's Feats for Country's Reunification
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- The Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of the Country of the DPRK (CPRC) issued a memorandum titled "The great leader Comrade Kim Il Sung is peerless patriot who performed undying feats for the sacred cause of the country's reunification" Thursday on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					 The memorandum said President Kim Il Sung propounded a unique idea that the country's reunification should be achieved by the concerted efforts of the Korean nation with its own responsibility, and hewed out the road of independent reunification.
					
					 After the liberation of Korea he aroused all the people to the struggle to check the permanent division of the nation and achieve the complete independence of the country, seeing through the true nature of the U.S. imperialists for aggression and division who occupied south Korea after the liberation, the memorandum said, and went on:
					
					 At a grim moment when the war of aggression against the north was on the point of outbreak due to the U.S. imperialists and the Syngman Rhee puppet clique, the President worked heart and soul to avert the holocaust of the war and realize the peaceful reunification of the country.
					
					 After the war he set forth lots of proposals and initiatives for reunifying the country independently and peacefully. And in 1960 he advanced the proposal of reunifying the country by federal formula between the north and the south.
					
					 Early in the 1970s, he put forth a policy on broad-ranging north-south negotiations, thus making a breakthrough toward the stalled north-south ties and opened up the way of dialogue and negotiations. Early in May 1972, he provided leadership for the holding of the first north-south high-level political talks in Pyongyang and the adoption of the historic July 4 North-South Joint Statement.
					
					 When the south Korean "yusin" dictator went wild in cooking up "two Koreas" while denying the basic spirit of the July 4 joint statement, the President clarified the five-point policy for the country's reunification, thus dealing a heavy blow at the reckless moves of the separatists at home and abroad and firmly maintaining the line of independent reunification.
					
					 In 1980 when a serious hurdle was laid in the way of the country's reunification due to the separatist moves of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean military fascist junta, he set forth the policy of establishing the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo and opened up a decisive phase for achieving the country's independent and peaceful reunification.
					
					 The high-level talks headed by premiers of the north and the south began from September 1990 and the "agreement on reconciliation, non-aggression, cooperation and exchange between the north and the south" was adopted in December 1991. This was a fruition brought about by his will and patriotic dedication to independent reunification.
					
					 Thanks to his great will and outstanding leadership, a historic occasion of opening the north-south summit talks, the first of their kind in the history of the nation's division, was provided at last in July 1994.
					
					 The President's great heart stopped beating after he left his last autographic sign on a document related to the national reunification just a few days before the north-south summit talks. This was the bitterest grief in the nation's history spanning 5 000 years, and the greatest loss to the Korean nation desirous of reunification.
					
					 Stressing that the President provided a solid foundation for the country's reunification through energetic ideological and theoretical activities and gigantic practices all his life, the memorandum went on:
					
					 Solving from a unique angle all the issues arising in the struggle for the country's reunification, he clarified precious ideology, line and policies that would serve as a cornerstone in accomplishing the cause of reunification.
					
					 The three principles of national reunification, the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo and the 10-point programme for the great unity of the entire nation constituted historic feats that would shine long in the Korean nation's history of reunification.
					
					 As he built the DPRK into a socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in the economy and self-reliant in national defence, we could firmly defend the nation's dignity and security and confidently advance the cause of the country's reunification despite the ceaseless aggression and war moves of the U.S. and other hostile forces.
					
					 The President firmly rallied all Koreans under the banner of reunification and patriotism and ushered in the new history of great unity of the nation with his noble virtue and warm compatriotism.
					
					 The cause of the country's reunification pioneered and led by the President was successfully carried forward and made victorious advance under the guidance of the great leader Kim Jong Il and it has now greeted the new phase of a decisive turn under the distinguished guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 As Kim Jong Un leads us and as there is the patriotic legacy for reunification provided by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, the cause of the country's reunification is sure to triumph and the future of the Korean nation is immensely bright and rosy.

articles.title: S. Korean Conservatives Blasted for Resorting to "Campaign to Eliminate Followers of North"
articles.content:
S. Korean Conservatives Blasted for Resorting to "Campaign to Eliminate Followers of North"
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- A spokesman of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of the Country of the DPRK (CPRC) released a statement on April 13 over the fact that the south Korean puppet conservative group is persisting in the base and absurd "campaign to eliminate the followers of the north" while groundlessly linking the impeachment of traitor Park Geun Hye and her arrest by the candlelight actions of the south Korean people from all walks of life with the DPRK to mislead the public opinion.
					 The statement said that the ultra-right conservative group of south Korea has asserted that the impeachment and arrest of Park is the results of "disturbance caused by the political operation of followers of the north" and the "plot of the pro-north leftist forces on the instruction of the north".
					
					 Terming the participants in the candlelight actions "forces under the backstage manipulation of the north", the group claims that the "pro-north leftist forces" should be eliminated and the conservatives should be rallied to prevent them from winning in the upcoming "presidential election", the statement noted.
					
					 Recalling such moves, the CPRC spokesman clarified the following stand toward the absurd "campaign for eliminating followers of the north":
					
					1. The miserable end of Park Geun Hye is the inevitable result as the south Korean ultra-right conservative forces made her the mistress of Chongwadae, dreaming of the revival of the "yusin" dictatorship.
					
					 Sea of candlelight sweeping south Korea was an eruption of the public wrath at the Park regime's misrule and her impeachment and detention are a stern punishment by the awakened popular masses.
					
					2. Park Geun Hye met such tragic end as she emerged "president" though she is the dreg having no elementary quality and thinking ability as a human being.
					
					3. The removal of Park from her position as "president" and her arrest are due results from the heinous crimes committed by her who got hell-bent on the confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north, playing a puppet of the shaman.
					
					4. If the south Korean puppet forces persist in the reckless "campaign", failing to properly understand the trend of the times, the north-south relations will never be improved and it will make it impossible to reunify the country.

articles.title: WPK Central Committee Hosts Reception for Foreign Party Delegations
articles.content:
WPK Central Committee Hosts Reception for Foreign Party Delegations
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) Thursday gave a reception for the party delegations of different countries staying here to celebrate the Day of the Sun, birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Present there on invitation were members of  a delegation of the Socialist Party of Moldova led by Grigore Novac, vice-chairman of its National Council, a delegation of the United Socialist Nationalist Party of Nepal led by General Secretary of its Central Committee Shankarlal Shrestha, a delegation of the Mongolian People's Revolutionary Party led by General Secretary E. Erdenejamyan, a delegation of the Bangladesh Jatiya Party led by Secretary General of its National Executive Council Mostafa Jamal Haider, members of a delegation of the Islamic Coalition Party of Iran led by First Vice-General Secretary Seyed Mehdi Joulaee, Mongolian Ambassador to the DPRK Suren Tsoggerel and Iranian Ambassador to the DPRK Seyed Mohsen Emadi.
					
					 Present there were Ri Su Yong, member of the Political Bureau and vice-chairman of the C.C., WPK, Ri Chang Gun, and other officials of the C.C., WPK including Vice Department Directors Ri Yong Chol and Ryu Myong Son.

articles.title: Secretary General of IIJI Arrives
articles.content:
Secretary General of IIJI Arrives
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Kenichi Ogami, secretary general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, and his party arrived here on Thursday to celebrate the Day of the Sun, birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Foreign Party Delegations Here
articles.content:
Foreign Party Delegations Here
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Foreign party delegations arrived here Thursday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 They included a delegation of the Mongolian People's Revolutionary Party led by General Secretary E. Erdenejamyan, a delegation of the Bangladesh Jatiya Party led by Secretary General of its National Executive Council Mostafa Jamal Haider, a delegation of the Islamic Coalition Party of Iran led by First Vice-General Secretary Seyed Mehdi Joulaee and a delegation of the United Socialist Nationalist Party of Nepal led by General Secretary of its Central Committee Shankarlal Shrestha.
					
					 Also arriving here on the same day was Antonio Razzi, secretary general of the Commission for Foreign Affairs of the Senate of Italy, and his party.

articles.title: Kyoto Delegation of Japan Here
articles.content:
Kyoto Delegation of Japan Here
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- A Kyoto delegation of Japan for celebrating the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung led by Tsutomu Yasui, vice-chairperson of the Japan-DPRK Friendship Kyoto Net for the Promotion of Cultural, Scientific and Civic Exchange, arrived here Thursday on the occasion of the Day of the Sun, the birth anniversary of the President.

articles.title: Families of Those Related to Anti-Japanese War Arrive
articles.content:
Families of Those Related to Anti-Japanese War Arrive
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Families of Chai Shiying, Jiang Zihua, Liu Tong-shi and Fan Delin, Chinese related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, and Pak Kil Song, Kim Chol and So Sun Ok, China-resident Koreans related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, arrived here on Thursday to celebrate the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Overseas Koreans Delegations Here
articles.content:
Overseas Koreans Delegations Here
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Society for Cooperation among Koreans in Germany led by honorary Chairperson Ri Ji Suk, a delegation of aged officials of the General Association of Koreans in China led by Director Tong Ju Bong, a delegation of the Association for Economic and Cultural Exchange of Korean Nationality in Dandong City of China headed by Chairman Kim Thaek Ryong and Ro Kil Nam, representative of Minjok Thongsin, an internet paper of Koreans in the U.S., and his party arrived here Thursday to mark the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: DPRK Weightlifters Back Home from 2017 World Juvenile Weightlifting Championships
articles.content:
DPRK Weightlifters Back Home from 2017 World Juvenile Weightlifting Championships
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- DPRK players returned home Thursday after competing at the 2017 World Juvenile Weightlifting Championships in Thailand.
					 At the championships, Han Jong Sim of the DPRK bagged two gold medals and a silver medal by coming first in women's 48kg jerk and second in snatch.
					
					 Kim Il Gyong won gold and silver medals in women's 53kg category while Ri Kwang Song won gold silver medals in men's 69kg category.
					
					 Pak Song Hui got three bronze medals in women's 44kg category.

articles.title: Delegates to Celebrations of Kim Il Sung's 105th Birth Anniversary Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Delegates to Celebrations of Kim Il Sung's 105th Birth Anniversary Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Delegates to the celebrations of the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun, the sacred temple of Juche, Wednesday.
					 They paid tribute to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il before their statues at the palace in profound reverence for them.
					
					 They paid homage to the great leaders at the halls where they lie in state.
					
					 They went round the halls where orders the great leaders received are on display and the halls that house cars, electric car, boat and train coaches used by them for field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their revolutionary lives.

articles.title: Senior Party Officials Visit Lodging Quarters of Delegates to Celebrations of Day of Sun
articles.content:
Senior Party Officials Visit Lodging Quarters of Delegates to Celebrations of Day of Sun
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Senior officials of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) Wednesday visited the lodging quarters of the delegates to celebrations of the Day of the Sun, the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Among them were Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Kim Phyong Hae and O Su Yong, vice-chairmen of the C.C., WPK.
					
					 Congratulating the delegates, they said that the new history of modern Korea began and the Korean people enjoy glory and happiness at present thanks to the President. 
					
					 They called upon the delegates to celebrate the 105th birth anniversary of the President as a great political festival, more grandiose and significant, and fulfill their responsibilities and duties in the drive of creation for implementing the patriotic wishes of the peerlessly great men to build a powerful country.

articles.title: Foreign Guests Visit Venue of 19th Kimilsungia Festival
articles.content:
Foreign Guests Visit Venue of 19th Kimilsungia Festival
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Diplomatic envoys, representatives of international bodies, the Economic and Commercial Councilors Corps and foreign embassy officials in charge of cultural and friendly relations and other foreign guests here visited the venue of the 19th Kimilsungia Festival on Thursday.
					 They were deeply impressed to see the potted immortal flowers in full bloom reflecting the sincerity of the army and people of the DPRK and the world progressives.
					
					 That day representatives of foreign embassies and international bodies toured the Ryugyong General Ophthalmic Hospital and the Military Attaches Corps visited Tree Nursery No. 122 of the Korean People's Army on Wednesday.

articles.title: Delegates to Celebrations of Day of Sun Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Delegates to Celebrations of Day of Sun Visit Mangyongdae
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Delegates to the celebrations of the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung visited Mangyongdae on Thursday.
					 After touring the Mangyongdae Revolutionary Museum, they looked round the historic mementoes preserved with much care at the President's old home, recalling his revolutionary career.
					
					 The delegates also visited the Korean Revolution Museum on the same day.
					
					 At the general review hall of the museum, they paid tribute to the President and leader Kim Jong Il before the picture depicting them.
					
					 Being briefed on the fact that the Korean Revolution Museum was remodeled into the best one in the world under the energetic guidance and scrupulous care of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, they went round the mementoes and materials displayed in different rooms.

articles.title: Delegates to Celebrations of Day of Sun Lay Floral Basket before Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Delegates to Celebrations of Day of Sun Lay Floral Basket before Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Delegates to the celebrations of the Day of the Sun, the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill Wednesday.
					 They laid a floral basket and bunches of flowers before the statues of the great leaders and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Floral Basket, Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from Diplomatic Corps Here
articles.content:
Floral Basket, Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from Diplomatic Corps Here
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket and a congratulatory letter from the diplomatic corps here on the occasion of the Day of the Sun, the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The floral basket and letter were handed over to Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho by Ismail Ahmed Mohamed Hasan, Palestinian ambassador to the DPRK who is doyen of the corps, Thursday.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Chinese Family
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Chinese Family
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket from the family of Zhang Wei-hua, Chinese related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The floral basket was handed over to an official concerned by Zhang Jin-quan, son of Zhang Weihua, on Thursday.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Palestinian President
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Palestinian President
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket from Mahmoud Abbas, president of the State of Palestine, on the occasion of the Day of the Sun, the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 Ismail Ahmed Mohamed Hasan, Palestinian ambassador to the DPRK, handed the floral basket to Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho Thursday.

articles.title: Floral Baskets to Kim Jong Un from Foreign Organizations and Figures
articles.content:
Delegates to Celebrations of Day of Sun Visit Mangyongdae
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Delegates to the celebrations of the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung visited Mangyongdae on Thursday.
					 After touring the Mangyongdae Revolutionary Museum, they looked round the historic mementoes preserved with much care at the President's old home, recalling his revolutionary career.
					
					 The delegates also visited the Korean Revolution Museum on the same day.
					
					 At the general review hall of the museum, they paid tribute to the President and leader Kim Jong Il before the picture depicting them.
					
					 Being briefed on the fact that the Korean Revolution Museum was remodeled into the best one in the world under the energetic guidance and scrupulous care of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, they went round the mementoes and materials displayed in different rooms.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Foreigners and Koreans in China visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill Thursday on the occasion of the Day of the Sun, the birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung. 
					 They include foreign guests and China-resident Koreans staying here to take part in the 19th Kimilsungia Festival, the economic and commercial councilors corps here and the family of Zhou Wei, daughter of Zhou Bao-zhong, a Chinese related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle.
					
					 The visitors laid floral baskets at the statues of the great leaders and paid tribute to them.
					
					 On the same day, a floral basket from Jong Il Sim, widow of DPRK Hero An Tong Su, was placed at the statues.

articles.title: Agricultural Workers Celebrate Day of Sun
articles.content:
Agricultural Workers Celebrate Day of Sun
Kangso, April 13 (KCNA) -- Agricultural workers and members of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea (UAWK) met in Chongsan-ri, Kangso District, Nampho City Thursday to celebrate the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Among those present at the meeting was Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea, vice-chairman of the DPRK State Affairs Commission and vice-chairman of the C.C., WPK.
					
					 Kim Chang Yop, chairman of the UAWK Central Committee, made a report there to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers referred to the fact that the President, who embarked upon the road of the revolution in his teens, performed the immortal exploits for the country, the people, the era and the history, while leading the Korean revolution for a long period.
					
					 They recalled that the President, who provided the traditions of peasant movement in the flames of the anti-Japanese revolution, had led the UAWK to fully display its mission and duty as reliable helper and companion of the Party at each historic phase of the building of a new country, the Fatherland Liberation War and socialist construction.
					
					 The dramatic change in the socialist countryside was a result of love and devotion of the President who had found himself among peasants until the last moments of his great life, they stressed.
					
					 The idea and cause of the President were invariably carried forward by leader Kim Jong Il and they shine rays generation after generation under the guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, they noted.
					
					 The speakers called for dynamically advancing toward the final victory in the building of a socialist power, united close around the Party Central Committee headed by Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Oratorical Meeting of Trade Union Members
articles.content:
Oratorical Meeting of Trade Union Members
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- An oratorical meeting "Our leader and the working class" by officials and members of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea took place at the Central Hall of Workers on Thursday to celebrate the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The performers praised the President's life of patriotic dedication to the sacred cause for the country and the people.
					
					 They stressed that the President was a kind-hearted father and a peerless patriot as he had always led a humble and simple life while bestowing all loving care and solicitude on the people.
					
					 It is the great honor, pride and fortune for Kim Il Sung's Korea and nation to have been led by the peerlessly great men of Mt Paektu, they said.
					
					 Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un who is identical to the great leaders, represents the great Paektusan nation and the dignity of Kim Il Sung's Korea, they said, stressing that the DPRK will shine as the country of the sun forever as it has the illustrious great person.
					
					 The Mallima era, a new era of prosperity, is opened up in the country under the leadership of Kim Jong Un, they said.

articles.title: Women's Poem-reciting and Singing Event
articles.content:
Women's Poem-reciting and Singing Event
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- A poem-reciting and singing event "Song of Mangyongdae" was held on Mangyong Hill by officials and members of the women's union on Thursday to celebrate the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 At the event that started with poem and chorus "Let's Sing of the Day of the Sun", the performers expressed ardent yearning for the President who shared sweets and bitters with the people, regarding it as his motto to believe in them as in heaven and finding himself among them all his life. 
					
					 They presented works reflecting their deep reverence for leader Kim Jong Il and praising the feats respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un has performed to translate the great leaders' patriotic desire for a powerful nation into a reality.
					
					 The event ended with group poem-recital and chorus "Green Pine on Nam Hill", "Advancing Socialism" and "Eternal Image" reflecting the Korean women's will to display their revolutionary stamina in the drive for creating the Mallima speed.

articles.title: 19th Kimilsungia Festival Opens
articles.content:
19th Kimilsungia Festival Opens
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- The 19th Kimilsungia Festival opened here to celebrate the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The festival on the theme "Kimilsungia fully blooms in the new era of country's prosperity" exhibits tens of thousands of potted Kimilsungias cultivated by more than 80 units, including armed forces organs, ministries and national institutions and people from all walks of life, youths and students.
					
					 Also on display are Kimilsungias presented by overseas Koreans organizations and compatriots, foreign embassies and missions of international bodies here and friendly and solidarity organizations and personages from different countries.
					
					 The opening ceremony took place at the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Exhibition House on Thursday.
					
					 Present there were Kim Ki Nam, Yang Hyong Sop and officials of the festival-organizing committee and units that presented the flowers of the sun, overseas compatriots' congratulatory groups and delegations, compatriots, officials of the Indonesian embassy here, members of organizations for supporting the dissemination of the famous flower and foreign guests.
					
					 Kim Chang Do, chairman of the Korea Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Committee, in his opening address expressed belief that the festival would powerfully encourage the army and people of the DPRK in their efforts to translate the patriotic desire of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il for the building of a power into a reality and greatly contribute to developing the good neighborly and friendly relations with the world progressive peoples.
					
					 Bambang Hiendrasto, Indonesian ambassador to the DPRK, said in his congratulatory speech that he deemed it a high pride and honor to take part in the opening ceremony of the festival, hoping that the friendly relations between the peoples of the two countries would grow stronger with Kimilsungia as a symbol.

articles.title: Third-day Performances of People's Art Festival
articles.content:
Third-day Performances of People's Art Festival
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Third-day performances of the Fifth April Spring People's Art Festival were given before full houses here on Thursday.
					 Pyongyangites and youths and students enjoyed the performances.
					
					 Provincial art troupes gave performances at the Pyongyang Grand Theatre and the East Pyongyang Grand Theatre.
					
					 The performers sang highly of the revolutionary career and feats of President Kim Il Sung who devoted all his efforts to the prosperity of the country and its people's happiness, regarding it as his lifelong motto to believe in the people as in Heaven.
					
					 They also impressively represented the Korean people's boundless reverence for leader Kim Jong Il who had led the socialist cause of Juche to ever-victory, holding aloft the banner of Songun all his life.
					
					 They showed the steadfast will of all the army and people of the DPRK to vigorously advance along the road of independence, Songun and socialism.
					
					 Multifarious magic pieces including illusionary jugglery, functional jugglery and interactive jugglery were given at the Magic Theatre of the National Acrobatic Troupe. 
					
					 A performance of art squads was given at the Ponghwa Art Theatre, performance of itinerant art squads at the Cultural Hall of the Ministry of Railways and performances of art circle members at the People's Palace of Culture and the Central Youth Hall. 
					
					 The performances go on.

articles.title: Concert of Art Group Members of Mangyondae Schoolchildren's Palace Marks Day of Sun
articles.content:
Concert of Art Group Members of Mangyondae Schoolchildren's Palace Marks Day of Sun
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- A concert was given by the art group members of the Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace on Thursday to mark the Day of the Sun, the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Put on the stage of the concert which started with prologue "Let Us be Proud of Our Day of Sun" were such numbers as chorus "Generalissimo Is Our Sun", duet and chorus "Song of Korea", an immortal masterpiece, folk dance "Fan Dance for Holiday" and jugglery "Precious Time".
					
					 The performers praised as the eternal sun Kim Il Sung who spared nothing for posterity, putting forward children as the king of the country and showing so much loving care for them.
					
					 They sang highly of the exploits of leader Kim Jong Il who continued a long and stormy journey for inspecting frontline units to defend and better the happiness of the rising generation.
					
					 Some numbers represented the appearance of happy children who are growing up with nothing to envy in the world under the care of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: 32nd National Sci-tech Festival
articles.content:
32nd National Sci-tech Festival
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- The 32nd national sci-tech festival took place in the DPRK with the attendance of Kim Il Sung University, the State Academy of Sciences, ministries, national institutions, scientific research and educational organs and over 300 units which proved successful at provincial (municipal) sci-tech festivals.
					 The theme of the festival was the development of the ultra-modern technology and integration of science and technology with production.
					
					 Presented to the festival were more than 500 sci-tech achievements.
					
					 Automatic feeding machine, fishing control system, nationwide integrated power control system, "Jipsam-2" medium-sized bus, vacuum casting method based on combustion of foamed-plastic mold and other exhibits convinced visitors that it is quite possible to speed up the building of a socialist power with the might of self-development.
					
					 The festival served as an important occasion in promoting this year's general offensive to open up the bright prospect for implementing the five-year strategy for national economic development and thus develop the overall economy onto a higher plane.

articles.title: Songhwa Fine Art Exhibition Opens
articles.content:
Songhwa Fine Art Exhibition Opens
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- The Songhwa fine art exhibition opened at the Pyongyang International House of Culture Thursday to celebrate the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Put on display are over 60 Korean paintings, oil paintings and water-color paintings created by old painters.
					
					 Seen in the center of the exhibition venue is a poster depicting the images of the President and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The exhibits include paintings reflecting the Korean army and people's deep yearning for the peerlessly great men of Mt Paektu and portraying the Korean nation's happiness of being blessed with the illustrious leaders generation after generation.
					
					 There are also paintings dealing with the reality of the DPRK making great changes each day under the guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un and the Koreans' desire for national reunification.

articles.title: Collection of Memoirs "Among the People" Vol. 106 Published
articles.content:
Collection of Memoirs "Among the People" Vol. 106 Published
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Collection of memoirs "Among the People" Vol. 106 was brought out by the Workers' Party of Korea Publishing House.
					 It contains 19 memoirs telling about the feats and popular personality of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Memoir "Ardent wish reflected in the Poem Dedicated to 'Ode to Shining Star'" deals with the personality of Kim Il Sung as a great man. He personally wrote the ode, convinced of the future when the country will immensely prosper under the leadership of Kim Jong Il praised by all peoples.
					
					 Another memoir tells about the personality of the President as a simple and modest man.
					
					 There are memoirs dealing with the wise leadership and great benevolence of Kim Il Sung who made tireless efforts for the economic development of the country and improvement of the standard of people's living. 
					
					 The book also contains memoirs telling about the profound loving care shown by the President for the soldiers and young people, bringing hope and future and blessings to them and leading them in every aspect of their work.
					
					 There are memoirs dealing with touching stories about the President. He took deep care of sons and daughters of revolutionary martyrs and trained them to be able officials of the country. There are stories about how the President projected an ordinary artist as a man of talent loved by the country and the people and visited an ordinary family which moved to a new house to look after every aspect of its life.

articles.title: Enlarged Edition of "Complete Collection of Kim Il Sung's Works" Vol. 1 Published
articles.content:
Enlarged Edition of "Complete Collection of Kim Il Sung's Works" Vol. 1 Published
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Enlarged Edition of "Complete Collection of Kim Il Sung's Works" Vol. 1 was published in the DPRK on the occasion of the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 The book, a cycle of the immortal Juche idea, the Songun idea, systematically and comprehensively deals with works of the President in a chronological order. 
					
					 It contains 96 works including speeches, concluding speeches and talks made by the President from October Juche 15 (1926) to February Juche 22 (1933).
					
					 Among them are works clarifying the stand that the master of the Korean revolution is the Korean people and the Korean revolution has to be carried out by the Koreans themselves to suit the specific conditions of Korea and ways to do so.
					
					 The book systematically and comprehensively deals with ideas and theories and strategic and tactical policies that give answers to theoretical and practical questions arising in the revolutionary struggle.

articles.title: Endless Stream of People Visit Ryongsan Revolutionary Museum
articles.content:
Endless Stream of People Visit Ryongsan Revolutionary Museum
Kaesong, April 13 (KCNA) -- The Ryongsan Revolutionary Museum in the DPRK is visited by an endless stream of people on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The museum is located in Ryongsan-ri, Kaesong City. Preserved in the museum are revolutionary historic relics and materials telling about the immortal leadership feats the President performed by personally visiting the Ryongsan Cooperative Farm on Aug. 25, Juche 46 (1957) to indicate the road to be followed by the farm.
					
					 Hundreds of thousands of people have visited the museum since its opening on April 13, 1981.

articles.title: DPRK Doctorate Conferred on Followers of Juche Idea
articles.content:
DPRK Doctorate Conferred on Followers of Juche Idea
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- The DPRK doctorate in socio-politics was conferred on foreign followers of the Juche Idea.
					 They are Songchit Pullarp, chairman of the Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea of Thailand, and Roland Vele Mukelenge, chairman of the Group for the Study of Songun Policy Formed in Bandundu University of DR Congo.
					
					 They have made devoted efforts to the study and dissemination of the Juche Idea in boundless reverence for President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 An awarding ceremony took place at the People's Palace of Culture here on Thursday.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung, Illustrious Commander
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung, Illustrious Commander
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- It has been twenty-five years since President Kim Il Sung was awarded the title of the DPRK Generalissimo.
					 It was an expression of boundless trust in the President and a noteworthy event to be recorded in the history of the Korean nation and the world politics.
					
					 After embarking upon the road of the revolution in his teens, Kim Il Sung defeated the Japanese imperialists and achieved the historic cause of national liberation with his brilliant stratagem and tactics and outstanding leadership, bearing in mind the will of Songun (military-first) that arms have to be countered with arms.
					
					 During the Fatherland Liberation War (1950-1953), the President created such peculiar Juche-based strategy and tactics unprecedented in human history of war as the formation of second front behind enemy line, tank-hunting team movement and tunnel warfare to deal annihilating blows to the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 For scores of years after the war, he safeguarded the destiny of the country and nation in the showdown with the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 He humbled the U.S. imperialists with his pluck and grit of Paektu whenever they escalated tensions through military provocations, including the spy ship Pueblo case, large spy plane EC-121 case and Panmunjom incident.
					
					 Indeed, President Kim Il Sung is the iron-willed commander and legendary great man unparalleled in history.
					
					 Therefore, the army and people of the DPRK bestowed the title of the Generalissimo on him on the occasion of his 80th birth anniversary.

articles.title: Great Life of People's Leader
articles.content:
Great Life of People's Leader
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- With the approach of the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, the father of socialist Korea, servicepersons and civilians in the DPRK recall with deep emotion his great life as the leader of people.
					 The President liberated the country from Japan's colonial rule through the bloody anti-Japanese armed struggle to save the destiny of the nation.
					
					 In his lifetime, he made a long journey covering over 578,000 kilometers for field guidance to more than 20,600 units, including military units, factories, farms, mines, schools, hospitals and even ordinary families across the country, for the happiness of the people till the last moments of his life.
					
					 Considering it as his pleasure to find himself among servicepersons and people, he had continued his field guidance day and night despite of weather conditions.
					
					 "Go among the people!", this was the noble political creed of the President who regarded "Believing in people as in Heaven" as his lifelong motto.
					
					 He had given top priority to the desire and interests of people in adopting lines and policies and led the revolution and construction to victory by enlisting their unfailing energy and creative ingenuity, always sharing bitters and sweets with them.
					
					 The feats of Kim Il Sung who founded the Juche idea and built the people-centered socialist state on this land will shine forever.

articles.title: Socialist Cause of Juche Is Invincible: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Socialist Cause of Juche Is Invincible: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- The history of President Kim Il Sung's revolutionary activities is that of a legendary great man who paved an original road of building socialism and built Juche-based socialism on this land.
					 Kim Il Sung was the pioneer of socialist cause of Juche and the father of socialist Korea, a Rodong Sinmun article Thursday says, speaking highly of his life-long feats.
					
					 The article says:
					
					 He was the first man in history to find out the philosophical principle that man is the master of everything and decides everything. He clarified from a fresh angle the law governing social movement as the one of Juche.
					
					 Based on it, he gave scientific clarification to the essence of socialism and the law governing its development, and provided the most correct theoretical and practical guidelines to be held fast to in socialist construction including the idea of giving definite precedence to the ideological work and human remolding.
					
					 Under his leadership the party and people of the DPRK successfully carried out social revolutions of two phases and socialist construction of several phases without the slightest deviation and vicissitude, thus building a socialist country, independent in politics, self-supporting in the economy and self-reliant in national defence in Korea where centuries-old backwardness and poverty once prevailed.
					
					 It was none other than the great leader who built the best socialism of Juche centered on the popular masses and turned the people's centuries-old desire and wishes into a brilliant reality.
					
					 His life was that of patriotic dedication to the people as he recorded the history of noble loving care and respect to the people while regarding it as his lifetime motto and a political creed to believe in the people as in heaven, and that of a great servant for the people as he looked after their life just as the real father of all families of the country.
					
					 Invincible is the socialist cause of Juche dynamically advancing along the road ushered in by Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: U.S., S. Korea Stage War Materiel Supplying Drill
articles.content:
U.S., S. Korea Stage War Materiel Supplying Drill
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and south Korean warmongers began war materiel supplying drill under the simulated conditions of contingency on the Korean Peninsula in the waters off Phohang of North Kyongsang Province on April 10, according to the south Korean Yonhap News.
					 Armed aggression forces involved in the drill are more than twice that of ordinary years. In particular, the U.S. imperialists mobilized the mobile task force Striker brigade which got notorious in the Iraqi and Afghan wars.
					
					 Different kinds of war games waged by the U.S. and south Korean military warmongers along with the deployment of the nuclear-powered carrier USS Carl Vinson strike forces in waters off the Korean Peninsula are driving the situation to the brink of a war.

articles.title: S. Korean Workers Wage Stay-in Strike
articles.content:
S. Korean Workers Wage Stay-in Strike
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Two workers of the Hyundai Heavy Industry Co. Ltd. waged a stay-in strike on a road in Ulsan City to demand the guarantee of basic labor right on Tuesday, according to the south Korean online paper Chamsesang.
					 Before the strike they demanded a stop to the dismissal of workers, calling for the withdrawal of part-time jobs and comprehensive guarantee of basic labor right.
					
					 They called upon workers to come out to the dedicated resistance at the job sites, too.

articles.title: S. Korean Bodies Launch Anti-War Peace Movement
articles.content:
S. Korean Bodies Launch Anti-War Peace Movement
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- South Korean organizations comprising people of different social standings launched a peace movement against war, according to the south Korean on-line paper Tongil News.
					 The South Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration, the Solidarity for Progress and other organizations of south Korea held a press conference in Seoul to declare the formation of the "Peace Action for Abolishing Deep-rooted Evils" on April 10.
					
					 Speakers said they would launch 10,000-signature campaign in Seoul and all-people peace movement ahead of the "presidential" election in May.
					
					 A press release was read out at the conference. The release stressed that they would, in solidarity with citizens, stage a peace action to turn the candlelight for ouster of Park Geun Hye into that for peace and reunification of the Korean peninsula.

articles.title: S. Korean Body Demands Halt to THAAD Deployment
articles.content:
S. Korean Body Demands Halt to THAAD Deployment
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification in south Korea reportedly held a rally outside the U.S. embassy in Seoul on April 11 to condemn the U.S. moves for deploying THAAD in south Korea.
					 Speakers at the rally demanded a halt to THAAD deployment as it was an evil product of the Park Geun Hye regime.

articles.title: Peerlessly Great Men of Mt Paektu Registered as Honorary Chairmen of Peruvian Party
articles.content:
Peerlessly Great Men of Mt Paektu Registered as Honorary Chairmen of Peruvian Party
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- The Socialist Political Action Party of Peru registered President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un as its honorary chairmen.
					 A ceremony was held on April 6 to convey the certificates of honorary chairmen presented to the peerlessly great men of Mt Paektu on the occasion of the Day of the Sun, the birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Present there were the acting general secretary of the Socialist Political Action Party of Peru and the DPRK ambassador to Peru and his embassy official.
					
					 The acting general secretary conveyed the certificates to the DPRK ambassador.
					
					 The certificates read that Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un were registered as honorary chairmen in praise of their feats for the founding and development of the Workers' Party of Korea, socialist construction in the DPRK, solidarity and brotherly ties among the peoples and the development of friendly and cooperative relations between the two parties.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feats Praised in Bulgaria
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Feats Praised in Bulgaria
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- The Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association released the April issue of its information bulletin.
					 In an article titled "105th birth anniversary of Comrade Kim Il Sung", the bulletin introduced the revolutionary career of President Kim Il Sung who performed undying feats for the times and history.
					
					 It said:
					
					 In the DPRK there's no jobless person and the working masses lead a happy life in the houses offered by the state free of charge, not knowing the meaning of word "tax" but enjoying the social benefits of all kinds.
					
					 The President provided this popular socialist system.
					
					 The Korean people hold him in high esteem as the father of the nation and the eternal leader and celebrate his birth anniversary as the Day of the Sun as he established the best socialist system.
					
					 The bulletin also carried an article dealing with his feats for army building.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Mongolia
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Mongolia
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- A Mongolian preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung was formed in Ulan Bator on April 7.
					 J. Lomvo, chairman of the Mongolian Preparatory Committee for Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu was elected the chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize colorful political and cultural events praising the revolutionary career and feats of the President on the occasion of the Day of the Sun, his birth anniversary.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige la competencia de tropas especiales del EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige la competencia de tropas especiales del EPC
Pyongyang, 13 de abril (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio la "competencia de descenso y ataque a blancos de las unidades de operaciones especiales del EPC-2017".
					En la ocasion tomaron parte los uniformados del batallon de operaciones especiales adscrito directamente a la unidad 525 del EPC, el 4o equipo de golpe del 5o destacamento independiente adscrito a la unidad 2625 de la gran unidad combinada 630 del EPC, el 2o equipo de golpe del primer destacamento independiente adscrito a la unidad 252 de las Fuerzas Maritimas del EPC y el primer equipo de golpe del primer destacamento independiente adscrito a la unidad 323 de las fuerzas aereas y antiaereas del EPC y los regimientos de los aviones ligeros de transporte y helicopteros armados de las fuerzas aereas y antiaereas. 
					
					El Comandante Supremo escucho en el puesto de vigilancia el informe sobre el plan de competencia y dio la orden de iniciarla. 
					
					Los aviones ligeros de transporte sobrevolaron a ras de tierra el campo de entrenamiento liberando a los combatientes que cayeron como granizada. 
					
					El Maximo Dirigente dijo sonriente que los combatientes descienden bien desde la altura muy baja y son muy intrepidos. Se mostro satisfecho senalando que en estrecha cooperacion, los comandantes de los equipos de golpe y los pilotos de la escuadrilla de aviones ligeros escogieron bien el punto de lanzamiento, la altura y el tiempo de retirada. Se denota que ellos estudiaron a hondo los datos de exploracion sobre los blancos enemigos, agrego. 
					
					Viendo a los combatientes valientes que aniquilan a tiros los blancos enemigos, califico de correcta la decision tomada por los comandantes. Anadio con satisfaccion que esos uniformados, que cumplen de modo independiente y con iniciativa sus misiones, se asemejan a los tigres feroces que atraviesan corriendo las cordilleras surcoreanas. 
					
					Tras presenciar el tiro de combate con el fusil automatico de los soldados del batallon de operaciones especiales adscrito directamente a la unidad 525 del EPC, el Comandante Supremo les evaluo como tiradores infalibles. 
					
					Destaco en tono emocionado que esta competencia, efectuada exitosamente en este periodo significativo en que se acerca el 105o aniversario de natalicio del Presidente Kim Il Sung, es un regalo de fidelidad del poderoso ejercito revolucionario del monte Paektu dedicado al gran Lider quien realizo esfuerzos abnegados e infatigables por completar los preparativos de combate del EPC instruyendo que los oficiales y soldados deben ejercitar mas y mas pensando siempre en la reunificacion de la patria. 
					
					Kim Jong Un dio como recuerdo el binoculo y fusil automatico al batallon referido, que ocupo el primer lugar en la competencia, y se retrato con los participantes.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un participa en el acto inaugural de avenida Ryomyong
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un participa en el acto inaugural de avenida Ryomyong
Pyongyang, 13 de abril (ACNC) -- En medio de que se torna cada dia mas activo el entusiasmo de los habitantes para celebrar como maxima fiesta nacional el 105o aniversario del natalicio del Presidente Kim Il Sung, se ha levantado la imponente avenida Ryomyong en la zona del Palacio del Sol Kumsusan, supremo lugar sagrado del Juche.
					Esta avenida, construida como la ejemplar de arquitectura moderna y paraiso de la epoca del Partido del Trabajo, deviene el regalo de fidelidad que el ejercito y pueblo de Corea ofrecen al Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					Tuvo lugar el dia 13 con solemnidad el acto inaugural de la avenida Ryomyong.
					
					Asistio al acto Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					
					Participaron Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae y otros cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido y las fuerzas armadas, ministerios y organos centrales, los delegados para las festividades del 105o aniversario del natalicio del Presidente Kim Il Sung, los funcionarios del ejercito y la sociedad participantes en la construccion, los constructores militares, los miembros de brigadas de construccion, los funcionarios de los organos, fabricas y empresas de esta capital, los cientificos, los educadores, los jovenes y estudiantes y los trabajadores.
					
					Ademas, estuvieron presentes el grupo de felicitacion y las delegaciones de coreanos residentes en ultramar, los compatriotas de visita en la patria, el representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang, los matrimonios de los representantes diplomaticos, los de miembros de oficinas de organizaciones internacionales y los de agregados militares, acreditados en la RPDC, y los huespedes extranjeros.
					
					El discurso inaugural estuvo a cargo de Pak Pong Ju.
					
					El orador dijo que la exitosa terminacion de la construccion de la avenida Ryomyong significa el informe de victoria orgullosa de todos los militares y civiles hacia los grandes Lideres antecesores y deviene la detonacion de salvas que adornan el Dia del Sol.
					
					Prosiguio que la avenida es el eterno monumento al amor por el pueblo en que esta reflejado el proposito del Partido-Madre de ofrecer en el supremo nivel la maxima civilizacion a los habitantes.
					
					Refirio a que el Maximo Dirigente proclamo la construccion de la avenida Ryomyong y condujo energicamente todo el proceso de la obra.
					
					Este reparto, simbolo de la gran epoca de Kim Jong Un, es la creacion orgullosa de la epoca de Mallima levantada por el indoblegable poderio espiritual y la fuerza inagotable del autofortalecimiento del ejercito y pueblo de Corea que materializan a toda costa lo todo que desea el Partido, concluyo.
					
					El Maximo Dirigente corto la cinta de inauguracion.
					
					Y envio el saludo cordial con la mano alzada a las masas que le daban efusivas aclamaciones.
					
					Terminado el acto, los cuadros del partido, el Estado y el ejercito y otros participantes recorrieron la avenida Ryomyong.

articles.title: ACNC publica la informacion detallada sobre el levantamiento de avenida Ryomyong
articles.content:
ACNC publica la informacion detallada sobre el levantamiento de avenida Ryomyong
Pyongyang, 13 de abril (ACNC) -- La Agencia Central de Noticias de Corea publico este jueves la informacion detallada la sobre la heroica lucha del ejercito y pueblo coreanos que han levantado en el maximo nivel la avenida Ryomyong, con motivo del 105o aniversario del natalicio del Presidente Kim Il Sung. 
					Cuando todo el pais esta lleno del ambiente festivo por el Dia del Sol, se ha completado excelentemente la construccion de la avenida Ryomyong, senala la nota. 
					
					El pueblo coreano construyo excelentemente en un ano esta avenida maravillosa socialista equivalente a una ciudad entera desarrollando, por una parte, la campana de resarcimiento de los danos de las zonas septentrionales de la provincia de Hamgyong del Norte, de manera que demostro claramente a todo el mundo la velocidad de avance de construccion socialista y la de construccion de potencia socialista del PTC. 
					
					La avenida Ryomyong compuesta con las viviendas de varios pisos incluyendo el rascacielos de 70 pisos y los modernos establecimientos de servicios publicos asegura perfectamente el nivel plastico, artistico y verde en la arquitectura conforme a la autoctona idea del PTC en materia de la estetica arquitectonica del Juche y las demandas del nuevo siglo, razon por la cual se considera como orgulloso monumento a la epoca del Partido del Trabajo, que sintetiza la maxima civilizacion, y simbolo de saltos de la gran Corea de Kim Jong Un que marcha a galopes hacia la victoria final.
					
					Se refiere al hecho de que el Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un propuso y dirigio sabiamente la construccion de la avenida y a los meritos heroicos manifestados en los dias de construccion por los oficiales y soldados del EPC, los constructores y los brigadistas de construccion. 
					
					Enfatizo que la avenida Ryomyong levantada elegantemente en Pyongyang por el gran proposito y sabia orientacion del Maximo Dirigente, brillara como monumento de la epoca del Partido del Trabajo manifestando el impetu poderoso de la Corea del Juche que marcha hacia el alba de la potencia socialista.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe cesto de flores de Mahmoud Abbas

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente electo de Serbia
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente electo de Serbia
Pyongyang, 13 de abril (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, remitio ayer un mensaje de felicitacion a Aleksandar Vucic, elegido como presidente de la Republica de Serbia. 
					Convencido de que las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises se desarrollaran aun mas conforme a los intereses de los pueblos de ambos paises, el remitente formulo votos por los exitos en las responsabilidades del destinatario por la prosperidad de Serbia.

articles.title: IDP del MINREX denuncia el ataque y amenaza de EE.UU. contra Siria
articles.content:
IDP del MINREX denuncia el ataque y amenaza de EE.UU. contra Siria
Pyongyang, 13 de abril (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Instituto de Desarme y Paz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hizo publica el dia 13 una declaracion de condena al ataque y amenaza militares que comete EE.UU. contra un Estado soberano reclamando la "paz por la fuerza". 
					Como ya trascendidos, EE.UU. perpetro contra Siria el ataque de numerosos misiles, lo cual deviene una flagrante violacion a la ley internacional y un barbaro y gangsteril acto de agresion, revela el portavoz y continua:
					
					EE.UU. perturba la paz y estabilidad del mundo presentando la doctrina de bandido de que su agresion a ese Estado soberano es "resuelta, justa y simetrica" y "defiende" el orden internacional, y pretende repetirla en la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					EE.UU. amenaza gravemente la paz y seguridad y lleva la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana al borde de guerra nuclear introduciendo incesantemente numerosas propiedades estrategicas nucleares en la Peninsula Coreana, zona mas candente del mundo.
					
					Como resultado, la Peninsula Coreana se encuentra en la crisis que puede extenderse a la guerra termonuclear en cualquier momento y se ven amenazadas seriamente la paz y la seguridad del Nordeste Asiatico y el resto del mundo. 
					
					Lo insoslayable del caso es que EE.UU. tolera abiertamente a los titeres surcoreanos quienes realizaron el lanzamiento de prueba del misil balistico con un alcance de 800km y anuncian en publico que lo emplazaran para el combate como propiedad estrategica capaz de "eliminar la Direccion Suprema del Norte". 
					
					No se puede perdonar en ningun caso la conducta injusta, dual y agresiva de EE.UU. que no dice nada del desarrollo de misil ni del lanzamiento de satelite espia cuando se trata de su aliado, pero ataca con misiles a los paises independientes poniendoles estigmas de toda indole.
					
					La realidad de hoy comprueba la verdad de que la paz no la regala nadie, sino se defiende con fuerzas propias y que fue correcta la opcion de la RPDC de aumentar notablemente las fuerzas armadas nucleares soportando la escasez economica. 
					
					Ahora, EE.UU. piensa "derrocar el regimen" de la RPDC mediante la "cooperacion" con alguien, pero esto es la ilusion mas pueril y estupida.

articles.title: Vocero del CRPP condena complot de conservadores ultraderechistas surcoreanos
articles.content:
Vocero del CRPP condena complot de conservadores ultraderechistas surcoreanos
Pyongyang, 13 de abril (ACNC) -- Ultimamente, la banda de conservadores titeres surcoreanos recurre obstinadamente al sucio y absurdo complot contra las supuestas "fuerzas seguidoras al Norte" induciendo en error la opinion publica como si la RPDC estuviera vinculada con la lucha de la poblacion surcoreana de diferentes sectores con velas encendidas y con la consiguiente dimision y encarcelamiento de la traidora Park Geun-hye.
					Al respecto, el vocero del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria hizo publica el dia 13 una declaracion que sigue:
					
					Los ultraderechistas conservadores surcoreanos insisten en que la dimision y encarcelamiento de Park Geun-hye se deben al "tumulto causado por el trabajo politico de las fuerzas seguidoras al Norte" y a la "conspiracion de las fuerzas izquierdistas pro-Norte al mando de este". Y se portan como locos abogando por "purgar a esas fuerzas" y frenar sin falta la toma del poder por ellas en las "elecciones presidenciales" que se acercan al lograr la unidad de todas las fuerzas conservadoras.
					
					Es un metodo rutinario y vicio de ellos fabricar un incidente intrigante anti-RPDC cada vez que se crea la grave crisis de dominacion y buscar asi la salida.
					
					Frente a ello, el vocero del CRPP expone la siguiente posicion:
					
					1. El desenlace miserable de Park Geun-hye es el resultado inevitable de la llegada de ella a Chongwadae que promovieron las fuerzas conservadoras ultraderechistas del Sur de Corea sonando con resucitar la dictadura de "Yusin".
					
					2. El fin tragico de ella es el saldo natural de la toma del "sillon presidencial" por esta escoria que lejos de ser politica, no tiene ni la elemental apariencia ni facultad pensativa del ser humano.
					
					3. La dimision y el encarcelamiento de la traidora son el precio de su tremendo crimen de haberse enfrascado en la campana de confrontacion fratricida actuando como marioneta de los tipejos como su bruja mentora.
					
					4. Si los titeres surcoreanos siguen recurriendo a la imprudente campana de la "purga de fuerzas seguidoras al Norte" sin distinguir bien la corriente de la epoca, no se mejoraran nunca las relaciones intercoreanas y sera mas lejana la reunificacion.
					
					Esa campana sucia y absurda no es nada mas que el ultimo coletazo para impedir la mejora de vinculos intercoreanos y la reunificacion manteniendo cueste lo que cueste la politica fratricida de la traidora Park sentenciada ya a la muerte.
					
					Es totalmente justa la severa sentencia de la historia dictada a los traidores que dieron espaldas al pueblo y la nacion.
					
					Por muy desesperado que fuera su ultimo pataleo, los conservadores surcoreanos no tendran ninguna salida del abismo de arruinamiento.
